yeah, well, I thought I'd fix her up,

French oak.

40 cases.

Mom.

Oh, my gosh! Oh, honey!

Mom?

Well, we just...

Are you kidding me? That place is a wreck.

Mom!

Oh, my goodness.

-Saves on the small talk. -Yeah.
Okay, until you get your shotgun, I think I have at least a few minutes.
translation.ko: 네, 엽총 꺼내기 전까지 몇 분은 얻은 것 같네요

translation.en: Better make it good then.
All right, um, listen, Callie,
I-I want you to know, the entire time
translation.ko: 캘리, 꼭 알아줬으면 해요 당신 밑에서 일하는 내내

translation.en: that I was working for you, it sucked.
translation.ko: 캘리, 꼭 알아줬으면 해요 당신 밑에서 일하는 내내 끔찍했어요

and I smelled like a cow's ass the entire time.
